newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bangladesh buys white sugar at $346.9 per tonne.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh buys white sugar at $346.9 per tonne.

text.p: Bangladesh's state-owned Sugar and Food Industries Corporation has bought 25,000 tonnes of white sugar at a C&F value of $346.9 per tonne for shipment by June 9, corporation officials said on Wednesday.
They said the deal was won by E.D & F.Man (Sugar) Ltd of Britain in a weekend bidding.
The officials said out of the total cargo 12,500 tonnes should reach the Chittagong port by May 29 and the rest by June 9.
